description:
Two and three-way file comparison of files including text, image, binary, Word, Excel, OpenDocument, PDF and RTF files. ASCII, MBCS and Unicode character encodings are supported.

In-place editing and straightforward merging. Colour-coded side-by-side comparison. Highlights of changes within lines.  Can be configured to ignore differences in whitespace and line endings, as well as changes in lines matching specified regular expressions.

Supports folder hierarchy comparison and synchronization, enabling you to compare and merge entire directory trees.

**Note: this is commercial software.** Without a valid licence, this is a 30-day trial version. Package maintainers have no affiliation with Araxis.
summary: Advanced two and three-way file comparison (diff), merging and folder synchronization.
author: Araxis
